element.name: TPLHashNode
element.short: The Structure that stores the Key and it's Data

element.name: TPLHashNode.ibucketindex
element.short: The Index of the Bucket where the Node is actually stored
element.descr: The Bucket Index will be assigned by the when the Structure will be assigned to it.

element.name: TPLHashNode.inodeindex
element.short: The Index within the Node List
element.descr:
inodeindex defines the Index of the TPLHashNode Structure within the List Object
The Node Index will be assigned by the when the Structure will be assigned to it.

element.name: TPLHashNode.ihash
element.short: The Hash Value of the Key

element.name: TPLHashNode.pvalue
element.short: The Data Value for the Key

element.name: TPLHashNodeList
element.short: The Data Node Bucket implemented as dynamic array of PPLHashNode
element.descr:
The TPLHashNodeList Object manages the TPLHashNode Structures that match into the same Bucket within the List Object.
With the Constructor the TPLObjectHashList List Object assigns an Index which the TPLObjectHashList assigns to all TPLHashNode Structures that are added to it.
